member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Html.HtmlContentBuilderExtensions.AppendFormat(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Html.IHtmlContentBuilder,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Appends the specified to the existing content after replacing each format item with the HTML encoded representation of the corresponding item in the array.
member.param: The composite format (see http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/txafckwd.aspx). The format string is assumed to be HTML encoded as-provided, and no further encoding will be performed.
The object array to format. Each element in the array will be formatted and then HTML encoded.
member.returns: A reference to this instance after the append operation has completed.

member.returns: A reference to this instance after the append operation has completed.
